id.description: The unique identifier of the metafield

created_at.description: The date and time when the metafield was created

description.description: A description of the metafield data

key.description: The key associated with the metafield

owner_id.description: The ID of the owner of the metafield

owner_resource.description: The resource type of the owner (e.g., user, product)

updated_at.description: The date and time when the metafield was last updated

value.description: The actual value of the metafield

value_type.description: The data type of the metafield value (e.g., string, integer)
